name: File_Not_Found (Demo)
description: You are a Cybernaut, a digital detective tasked with solving an old case involving the disappearance of an eccentric TV host. Navigate your way through the files of this simulation of a Windows XP style desktop, uncovering key words and clues to further your investigation as you search through photos and videos to solve the mystery. Your boss will be waiting for results, periodically asking for your opinion and ultimately your verdict.
